Grid System

CSS Grid options to place your content.

Auto Width Columns

Auto Width Columns: Add class "grid grid-flow-col" to the parent element. The child elements is automatically arranged next to each other in the grid system and the width is automatically assigned by the CSS grid system.

Div takes the content width.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet conse ctetur adipi sicing elit Fuga, blan ditiis?

Div with some text
I'm another Div

Equal Width Columns

Add class "grid grid-col-(x)" to the parent element. The child elements is automatically arranged next to each other in the grid system and the width is automatically assigned by the CSS grid system.

The child elements will take up 3 columns and repeat itself.

First Div
I'm another Div

Div width is same as other children.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Equal Width Dynamic Cols.

Add class "grid col-fit-(x)" to the parent element. The child elements scale to equal width columns and the space get's divided equally when new cells are added.

The child elements will take up 3 columns and repeat itself.

First Div
I'm another Div
I'm another Div

Div width is same as other children.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

Column width.

Add class "grid grid-col-(x)" to the parent element. The child elements can span from col-span-1 to col-span-12.

NOTE: To offset the columns use start-col-(x) and end-col-(x) instead of col-span(x)

col-span-12
col-span-6
col-span-6

col-span-8

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

.col-span-4
Responsive offset cols with col-start-x/col-end-x
col-span-4

Grid Columns.

Add class "grid grid-col-(x)" to the parent element. The child elements can span from col-span-1 to col-span-12.
